review: We actually use this alot for the kids to watch PBS and other cartoons. I do watch some movies and hulu plus.
author: Alicia

review: It did not work. Must be a reason it was 'refurbished' in the first place.
author: SHERRY A EARNEST

review: So easy to setup.  Already signed into my account.  Plug in, sign into wifi and watch movies and TV shows right away.
author: Josh

review: It seems to work well. Haven't had too much time with it yet.
author: Sue Zienert

review: Quality item, works well, easy set-up and easy to use... alittle too small for a Man with large hands... could raise the 'circular' buttons, too flush.Good item... recommend!
author: Jean D

review: The UI is excellent and easy to setup. Wish it had VUDU app but overall I like the firestick. I have Two Roku's which I love but the firestick is just as good.
author: Craig Breakspear
